About Me

I am Atiqullah Naemi. I am a creative, passionate, enthusiastic and technical web developer/designer with strong problem solving, communication and management skills. I am highly motivated and love programming and web development.

Download our app and we’ll send you a notice if it’s about to rain in the next 20 minutes around your current location. A good rain can be refreshing, but sometimes you just want to stay dry.
